parameters.message:
Hi [First Name],  
We noticed you opened our recent email — thank you for staying connected! 
🙌 But we think you might have missed the best part…  
👉 [Big Benefit or Offer — e.g., “Get 20% off your next order — today only!”]  
We don’t want you to miss out — just click below and grab your exclusive [deal / resource / upgrade].  
[CTA Button: “Claim Your Offer”]  Still not sure? We’re here to help if you have any questions. Just hit reply — we love hearing from you!  Talk soon, [Your Name] [Your Company]
parameters.subject: Did you miss this? Here’s something special for you!

parameters.content:
## 🎯 **🔹 SECTION 1: Schedule & Prepare Inputs**

### ✅ **Nodes in this Section**

| Node | Name                             |
| ---- | -------------------------------- |
| ⏰    | **Daily Campaign Check Trigger** |
| ✏️   | **Set Campaign Input Fields**    |

---

### 💡 **What Happens Here**

* **⏰ Daily Campaign Check Trigger:**
  This node automatically **starts the workflow on a schedule** — for example, every morning at 9 AM.
  It makes sure you **don’t have to run it manually** every time. The goal is to check your email campaign performance **regularly and consistently**.

* **✏️ Set Campaign Input Fields:**
  This node **defines any input values** that your Agent needs.
  For example:

  * Campaign ID
  * ESP URL
  * Date range
  * Any dynamic variables

  It acts like **filling in a form** that the rest of the workflow will use.
  You can **edit it easily** without changing the whole workflow.

---

### 🎯 **Why It’s Important**

✅ Automates the whole thing on autopilot.
✅ Ensures the Agent always has the **right data**.
✅ Makes the workflow easy to maintain for non-tech users — just change a value in **Edit Fields**, done!

---

---

## 🤖 **🔹 SECTION 2: Scrape & Analyze with AI Agent**

### ✅ **Nodes in this Section**

| Node | Name                                             |
| ---- | ------------------------------------------------ |
| 🤖   | **Agent: Scrape & Analyze Campaign Performance** |
| 🧠   | **LLM: Summarize & Format**                      |
| 🌐   | **Bright Data MCP: Scrape Report**               |
| 🗂️  | **Parse Scrape Output**                          |

---

### 💡 **What Happens Here**

* **🤖 Agent: Scrape & Analyze Campaign Performance**
  This is your **AI Agent** — it does the smart part:

  * Talks to the **Bright Data MCP Tool** to scrape the ESP report page.
  * Uses an **LLM** (OpenAI Chat Model) to process the scraped data.
  * Passes the result to an **Output Parser** to turn messy text into clean, structured data.

* **🌐 Bright Data MCP: Scrape Report**
  Bright Data logs in, navigates to your campaign report page, and **scrapes live open/click numbers**.

* **🧠 LLM: Summarize & Format**
  The Chat Model turns raw scraped info into easy-to-read Markdown or JSON.
  This is like having a mini data analyst!

* **🗂️ Parse Scrape Output**
  This node extracts the final numbers (open rate, CTR, bounces) so the logic can understand them.

---

### 🎯 **Why It’s Important**

✅ You don’t have to log in manually to get reports.
✅ The AI cleans up messy scraped data.
✅ Makes follow-up decisions possible without human effort.
✅ Works for **any ESP** — if the layout changes, just adjust the scraper.

---

---

## 📈 **🔹 SECTION 3: Decide & Act Automatically**

### ✅ **Nodes in this Section**

| Node | Name                                |
| ---- | ----------------------------------- |
| 🔎   | **IF: Open ≥30% & CTR <10%?**       |
| 📧   | **Send Follow-Up Engagement Email** |
| 🚫   | **Skip — No Action Needed**         |

---

### 💡 **What Happens Here**

* **🔎 IF: Open ≥30% & CTR <10%?**
  This node checks:

  * Is the open rate good? (≥30%)
  * But is the click-through rate low? (<10%)
    If **true**, it triggers follow-up to re-engage the audience.

* **📧 Send Follow-Up Engagement Email**
  If the condition is true, this node sends a **personalized follow-up email** automatically.
  For example: “Hey, you opened but didn’t click — here’s your special offer!”

* **🚫 Skip — No Action Needed**
  If the condition is **false** (e.g. CTR is healthy), do nothing. The workflow ends safely.

---

## I’ll receive a tiny commission if you join Bright Data through this link—thanks for fueling more free content!

### https://get.brightdata.com/1tndi4600b25

=======================================
            WORKFLOW ASSISTANCE

=======================================

  This is your **AI Agent** — it does the smart part:

  * Talks to the **Bright Data MCP Tool** to scrape the ESP report page.
  * Uses an **LLM** (OpenAI Chat Model) to process the scraped data.
  * Passes the result to an **Output Parser** to turn messy text into clean, structured data.

* **🌐 Bright Data MCP: Scrape Report**
  Bright Data logs in, navigates to your campaign report page, and **scrapes live open/click numbers**.

* **🧠 LLM: Summarize & Format**
  The Chat Model turns raw scraped info into easy-to-read Markdown or JSON.
  This is like having a mini data analyst!

* **🗂️ Parse Scrape Output**

---

### 🎯 **Why It’s Important**

---

---

## 📈 **🔹 SECTION 3: Decide & Act Automatically**

### ✅ **Nodes in this Section**

| Node | Name                                |
| ---- | ----------------------------------- |
| 🔎   | **IF: Open ≥30% & CTR <10%?**       |
| 📧   | **Send Follow-Up Engagement Email** |
| 🚫   | **Skip — No Action Needed**         |

---

### 💡 **What Happens Here**

* **🔎 IF: Open ≥30% & CTR <10%?**
  This node checks:

  * But is the click-through rate low? (<10%)
    If **true**, it triggers follow-up to re-engage the audience.

  For example: “Hey, you opened but didn’t click — here’s your special offer!”

* **🚫 Skip — No Action Needed**
  If the condition is **false** (e.g. CTR is healthy), do nothing. The workflow ends safely.

---

### 🎯 **Why It’s Important**

✅ Takes action **only when needed**, saving time.
✅ Boosts click rates without extra manual work.
✅ Protects your audience from spam by not sending unnecessary follow-ups.

---

## 🌟 **✨ Why This Whole Flow is Powerful**

* Runs daily — **no manual checks**.
* Scrapes live data — **no API? No problem!**
* Uses AI to process messy data — **no coding required!**
* Makes smart decisions — **no human micromanagement**.
* Sends the right email to the right audience at the right time — **better engagement, better ROI!**

---

_metadata.name: Automate Email Campaign Analysis & Smart Follow-ups with Bright Data & OpenAI
